title: Customers of this website may share contents.
detail: "Personal Information" means and includes all information collected for lawful purpose and for meeting the objectives of www. mysleepwell.com. The information also includes details that can be linked to an individual or to identify any such individual, viz. name, contact number, email address, etc. When you visit www.mysleepwell.com website, we may collect information regarding the domain name and host from which you are accessing the website, the internet protocol address of the computer / laptop or internet service provider you are using and any other statistical data. The users/customers are informed through this Privacy Policy that.

Users / Customers of this website may share contents or information, reviews, comments, send communications; and submit suggestions, ideas, comments, questions or other details, as long as the content is not illegal, obscene, abusive, threatening, defamatory, invasive of privacy, infringing of intellectual property rights of others or otherwise injurious to third parties, or objectionable and does not consist of or contain software viruses, political campaigning, commercial solicitation, chain letters, mass mailings, or any form of "spam."
